alert.note: Alert for Butler; Grayson; Logan; Ohio; Warren (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 3:53AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Logan, Butler, southwestern Grayson, northwestern Warren and southeastern Ohio Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 252 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Morgantown, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, torrential rainfall, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Morgantown around 305 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
